## Compute the number of unique values in each column of `iris`

### Using a `for` loop

```{r}

uniq_val <- function(a) {
  output <- vector("numeric", ncol(a))
  for (i in seq_along(a)){
    output[i] <- length(unique(a[i]))
  }
  return(output)
}

uniq_val(iris)

```
